name: LOVE Smoothing Shampoo for Frizzy Hair
about: What it is:A foaming, creamy shampoo for coarse or frizzy hair that cleanses while smoothing, leaving unruly hair looking sleek, shiny, and effortlessly smooth..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Smooths and cleanses frizzy hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Minuta Olive Extract: Fatty acids and vitamin E are nourishing, softening, and moisturizing..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan..What Else You Need to Know:This shampoo is infused with Minuta olive extract, which is abundant in fatty acids and vitamin and therefore contributes to boost hair's shine and elasticity. Slow Food Presidia support small producers so they can continue to grow traditional and artisanal products and plants that are at risk of disappearing.
ingredients: -Minuta Olive Extract: Fatty acids and vitamin E are nourishing, softening, and moisturizing...Aqua / Water / Eau, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Coco-Glucoside, Parfum / Fragrance, Glyceryl Oleate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Panthenol, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenethyl Benzoate, Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate, Coconut Acid, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Benzoate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Lauryl Alcohol, Lauric Acid, Polyquaternium-7, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Isethionate, Amodimethicone/Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Olea Europaea Fruit Extract / Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Laurate, Trideceth-5, Glyceryl Stearate, Limonene, Ci 60730 / Ext. Violet 2, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5, Ci 61570 / Green 5.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a small amount to wet hair and gently massage into scalp, lengths, and ends of hair..-Repeat if needed. .-After rinsing out, follow with LOVE Smoothing Conditioner (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! Ive used bumble and bumble and Anika, and this ones seems to work best on my wave/thin hair. I pair with the Love conditioner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo works very well for my thick coarse frizzy hair.  I don't care for the strong floral scent but I do not notice it after cleansing so I'm ok with that.  My long hair looks shiny, smooth and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the small size first and quite frkanky this shampoo is one of the best i have tried for frizz. I have unrued heat treated hair that whenever it dries with air, my hair looks bigger than the sun!ud83dude35u200dud83dudcab eas need of something that tamed the hair while providing shine and mous shine

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Smoothes without flattening hair or leaving a film like some other smoothing shampoos. Gives a good cleanse. Pleasant fragrance that is hard to describe; maybe clean, slightly foral/herbal?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my hair feel SO clean!! I am honestly obsessed. It feels like a salon wash every time I use it. This is my first time using this brand and I am hooked. It smells good, has clean ingredients, and actually cleans your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smoothing shampoo does exactly as advertised. While using this shampoo, I have noticed my curls getting more smooth, less separated and better texture overall. As a curly girl, this is key to the perfect wash day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product from Skeepers for free and I love it. It cleans so well and leaves my hair smooth and frizz free. It smells really good and also is soft and makes my hair so soft. I would recommend this shampoo to anyone who wants soft and frizz free hair!

Taming angry hair? This is it. It cleanses well without stripping the hair and no scalp irritation nor dryness while reviving and calming the angry hair ends. There is no weird residue left behind either . Definitely worth checking out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the Love Shampoo gifted by Davines alot. It smells lovey and lathers nicely. Its wonderful that it contains clean, natural ingredients and as a bonus its recyclable material. It definitely helps smooth my frizz prone curls and makes them look healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Love smoothing shampoo is great! Living in Florida my hair always gets frizzy so fast. By using this shampoo for three weeks I already notice a difference. My hair is smoother and less frizzy. I love that this has clean ingredients and smells good. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo leaves my hair feeling clean, hydrated, and helps with smoothing my often frizzy hair. It has a light/medium lather and a pleasant scent. I love that it feels nourishing without weighing my hair down. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good! I like that it's purple - don't see a lot of purple shampoos out there. Makes my hair smooth as usual like other shampoos I use.  I wanted to wait a bit before publishing my review because I wanted to see how well the shampoo held up throughout the week.  It seems to work pretty well - lots of brands make my scalp itchy or oily throughout the week but this one so far hasn't (and it's been 5 days). Well it is occasionally itchy but not too bad (unlike other shampoos I've tried)!   (I was gifted by Davines in exchange for an honest review!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It smells really and makes my hair so smooth. I feel like I can already see a difference in my hair l. Im so excited to continue to use it and see the results. Honestly I usually use a few products and all I did was shampoo and conditioner to test this and it gave great results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great shampoo. The entire line is great. It feels very nice on my hair and does a great job keeping it smooth and soft. It has great ingredients and a little goes a long way. I recommend this.

reviews.review_title: A must-have if you have frizzy hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to have frizzy hair, so I am always looking for a good smoothing shampoo.  This one leaves my hair clean and smooth.  Bye, bye frizz.  I also enjoy the light scent.  I will definitely be repurchasing this shampoo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. My hair has never felt so clean and looked so good. My hair looks healthy and shiny but also smooth and sleek. Im obsessed with the shampoo. Gifted by Davines. Will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It does what it promises. My hair feels smooth and soft after each use. Clean ingredients and cute simple packaging is a big plus for me too. Wasn't a big fan of the scent of this shampoo but not a deal breaker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My scalp can get really dry from shampoos but this one is really nourishing to my scalp and does not overly strip it. I love that when I wash with this my hair feels instantly smoother in the shower and I can tell it got all the gunk out without drying me out! Received complimentary from Davines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted from Davines, this shampoo is amazing on my hair. It lathers well and smells really nice. After washing my hair with this shampoo, my hair feels so clean and soft. I also pair the shampoo with the love conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this shampoo for years!!! Not only does it smell amazing, it is lightweight but cleanses so well. My hair can get oily throughout the day so it really does matter which shampoo I use and this one is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yall. YALL! Listen up!!! This smoothing shampoo is really that good. I mean it! Davines did it right with this product I can say that much! My hair feels like siiiillllk and being in the humidity of summer, my frizz is so controlled I can hardly believe it. This was gifted to me by Davines in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Davines, their love smoothing shampoo is great for those of us with frizzy hair in humid conditions. My hair feels clean and looks smooth after blow drying with this shampoo. It also looks healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging of this shampoo. The bottle is so cute and I love the color of the actual shampoo. It cleans without making my hair too dry which is also a plus. Give it a try if youre looking for a new go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has very frizzy, wavy, dry hair, this product has helped me be able to maintain my waves without stripping my hair of its essential oils. I love everything about this product! Definitely a new favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love Shampoo. I gave my niece to try this because she has thick and curly hair. She said that it did wonders for her, she loved it and it made her hair less frizzy, the smell can be better. Over all the product does what its supposed to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this shampoo! I saw a noticeable difference in the smoothness and fizziness of my hair father using it. The color is super cute and it smells like a mix of lavender and olive oil which is nice and soothing. You dont need as much product as you do with other brands which is nice because itll last a while for the price. As with all Davines products, I wish they were sealed. Id love to try the matching conditioner to see if this amplifies the effects of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this product it not only made my hair smell amazing! It left it feeling light weight and hydrated! I would absolutely recommend this to anyone needing a good shampoo! 10/10 love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo left my hair incredibly soft, smooth, and smelling fantastic. I've received so many compliments since I started using it! Definitely a game-changer for my hair care routine. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have wavy thick hair and live in the south so my hair gets pretty frizzy. I also have a lot of breakage from postpartum so I was looking for something g hydrating! This shampoo has been so great. My hair feels so soft and manageable and Ive seen an improvement in how much frizz I get throughout the day. Great shampoo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You only need a little bit of this shampoo to work and i dont have to wash my hair everyday as it does a good job of cleaning up my scalp and smoothening out my split ends. Highly recommend if you have an oily scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love this shampoo so much!! first off, i have to say that ive always wanted to try out this brand before because ive heard so many good things!! my hair is much less frizzy after using and smells like i just left the salon!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Daviness Love gifted me smoothing shampoo for trying. Their hair products are pure magic my hair never felt so fine - silky and soft! So happy with it that I plan to use it for long time! Smells nice and I love the simple packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 5 out of 5 stars u2b50ufe0f u2b50ufe0fu2b50ufe0fu2b50ufe0fu2b50ufe0f  This shampoo tames frizz and leaves my hair feeling incredibly smooth and manageable. The gentle formula cleanses without stripping natural oils, and the scent is very delightful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift in exchange for my honest review! I was a little worried that this wouldnt work well for my fine 2b hair- that it would be too heavy or u201ctoo smoothingu201d but I was shocked! This made my hair actually smooth and soft. Not greasy, not heavy, no residue, it lathered nicely and I didnt need to use very much. I wouldnt use this every wash, but Ill add it to my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo smells good, is gentle on my hair, and leaves it smooth and manageable. It has been a lifesaver in this humidity, doing a fantastic job of keeping my frizz under control and making my hair look put together.

reviews.review_title: Love to love on your hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love shampoo really gives love to your hair. I recently cut my hair and my old shampoo/conditioner was not doing it. My hair cut didnt even look as cute bc my hair was just frizzy! Love has hydrated my hair, made it smoother (I dare to even let it air dry now) its completely transformed my hairs body. I am so glad I made the switch. I have purchased this many times, I was gifted this shampoo for a review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey beauties! ud83cudf38 Today, I want to share my experience with the Davines Nou Nourishing Purple Shampoo, a gem I've recently discovered that has transformed my hair care routine. **u2728 Yellow Neutralization:** This purple shampoo is perfect for those of us who struggle with unwanted yellow tones in our blonde, grey, or highlighted hair. From the first use, I noticed how my hair took on a cooler, more vibrant tone. **ud83dudca7 Deep Hydration:** What I love most about this product is its ability to nourish and hydrate. Unlike other toning shampoos that can dry out your hair, Davines Nou leaves my hair super soft and manageable. **ud83cudf43 Natural Ingredients:** With a formula enriched with natural ingredients, this shampoo takes care of our hair without using harsh chemicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo (no pun intended lol ) it lathers really well and I like how it has a light scent thats not overbearing. I was gifted this product and I would definitely purchase after I finish this bottle !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo! It really smoothed my hair out which is amazing during the summer humidity. My hair feels hydrated and I have had noticeably less split ends. I also enjoy the botanical smell and that it is made with farm ingredients. Your hair will love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this shampoo cleaned my hair so well, it smells amazing also. it's a decently thick shampoo which i like because it removes all of the debris and dirt from my hair! this product was gifted by davines US

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received something in exchange for this post. I love this product so much, it makes my hair so soft . It also helps with my frizzy, curly , crazy hair!! This is a must have beauty product and a must have step in my hair routine!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a dedicated hair care enthusiast, I recently tried the LOVE Smoothing Shampoo by Davines, and I must say, it lives up to its name. The first thing I noticed was the luxurious lather and the delightful scent, which made my shower feel like a spa experience. After just one wash, my hair felt noticeably smoother and more manageable. Over time, Ive observed a significant reduction in frizz, and my hair looks shinier and healthier. The natural ingredients in the formula make it gentle yet effective, making it a new staple in my hair care routine. Highly recommended for anyone looking to tame unruly hair and achieve a sleek, polished look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo only lathers lightly, which I find much gentler. It doesn't strip away all the natural oils on my scalp but still helps my hair look refreshed. I'm not a big fan of the scent; however, once applied and rinsed off, the smell becomes very subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The LOVE Smoothing Shampoo smelled great and left my hair feeling fresh, clean and light weight in the shower and afterward! It left my hair feeling nice and soft once it dried and didnt strip it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair feels and looks so much smoother and healthier! It helped so much with frizz. It smells amazing and its not drying on your scalp nor does it leave any grease residue. I would definitely recommend

I really like this shampoo it left my hair feeling super soft and I loved the way it made my hair felt! Also it smells amazing and its one of the best shampoos I have used definitely recommend it I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this shampoo for many years, ever since I tried a sample. It smooths my frizzy hair and leaves it shiny and healthy. A little goes a long way, so I don't have to wash my hair daily. The scent is lovely too. It's a bit pricey but worth it for me. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was received in exchange for a review. I love the smell and it leaves my hair feeling clean but not dry which some shampoos tend to do. It is smoothing because my hair is really frizzy so I do some help when it comes to flyaways!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by brand. This was my first time trying this shampoo. I have medium wavy hair that tends to get a bit frizzy if I dont use the right products. This helped smooth my hair and smelled super great. A bit goes a long way which took me a bit to learn since the first time I felt like it weighed my hair down a bit. Also make sure to rinse thoroughly and it will definitely keep your hair less frizzy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product! i love all davines hair products, they are so wonderful. they make your hair feel super smooth and look shiny! i like the smell of this one and this is my second bottle, so love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had heard of this product from a friend and have been wanting to try it a couple of months now. I got my hands on a bottle and understand now what the hype is. Its really the highest quality and a little product goes a long way. My hair didn't feel stripped, but felt clean. I've been using it a few washes now and my hair looks so healthy.

I received this product as a gift and I am really loving it so far! I have noticed a huge difference in the smoothness of my hair. My hair is a lot less frizzy which is very good in the Florida humidity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by davines but it is a great shampoo. I have always been a fan of their brand when my old hairstylist sent me home with some shampoo and conditioner from them years ago. The smoothing shampoo definitely decreases the frizz my hair typically has right after a shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice light fresh floral scented shampoo. I really enjoyed using it. I really enjoyed the scent and it cleaned my hair very well. I have been using it after beach days and after swimming in chlorinated water.  Very happy with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is so nice! I love how it hydrates and leaves my hair feeling super smooth after use! I used it in the shower and washed out then I paired with the conditioner. It smells really good and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair
reviews.review_text: I was thrilled to receive this complimentary Love Smoothing Shampoo. It lathers amazing in the shower, cleaning hair very well and smells absolutely divine. This is definitely one of the best shampoos Ive ever used. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is great, I love the size of it ans it smells good without being overpowering. My hair feels clean and I only wash it once a week. I live the big bottle I wish you could refill them to be more conscious of plastic bottles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Davines US gifted me this love smoothing shampoo, the shampoo is for frizzy and unruly hair, it gives you smooth look on your hair, it smells so good too, i loved it using on my hair, it made my hair really soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, love shampoo is indeed love. I have thin, curly hair with an oily scalp and really have a hard time with finding a shampoo that cleans my scalp without drying my hair too terribly or the other hand, weighing my hair down or weighing down my curls (of course curl cream and gel is needed etc). But this is fantastic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo. My hair is very wavy and thick. Sometimes shampoo leaves my roots greasy and my ends dry after a day, but this hasnt done it so far. My hair feels great after and doesnt seem to get tangled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with this shampoo! I  wanted to try because I saw good reviews and here I am . Happy and Im going to get more! This shampoo leave my hair , shine and glamorous;) my hair looks healthy and smell OMG delicious ud83eudd24

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Davines US LOVE Smoothing Shampoo, and I must say, I'm impressed. My curly hair tends to frizz easily, but this shampoo worked wonders. From the first wash, I noticed my hair felt smoother and more manageable. It has a light, pleasant scent that isn't overpowering. After a week of use, my curls look defined and shiny without feeling weighed down. Overall, this shampoo has become a staple in my hair care routine. Highly recommended for anyone looking to tame frizz and enhance their natural curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have wavy-curly hair (2A-3C) that gets frizzy with the smallest amount of humidity. In the hot summertime, my hair is generally an unruly mess without any smooth definition to my wavy-curls. This LOVE smoothing shampoo truly prevents my hair from getting overly frizzy even on high-humidity days (basically this whole summer)! It feels really nourishing on my scalp and while Ive never dyed my hair, the formula seems gentle enough that it would maintain any dyed color. I love that the packaging is made with clean energy and the packaging is 100% recyclable. This product was gifted by Davines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this love shampoo has been my new holy grail for the past little bit, i have recently dyed my hair blonde from being naturally brunette and let me tell you how much of a difference its made. i use this product once a week

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Talk about a throughout cleanse! My scalp hasnt thanked me more! Its feels so nourished and clean without leaving a terrible build up. Not to mention it smells very delightful! The consistency is just perfect, not to runny nor to thick! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo! First off, the smell is greatu2014it feels like a day at the spa every time I wash my hair. But what's even better, it totally fights frizz. My hair feels really smooth and very manageable on days with high humidity. I have used so many shampoos, but none of them worked to leave my hair looking this healthy and shiny. Definitely worth the investment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this love smoothing shampoo is amazing! it cleans my hair really well but its not very drying. it makes my hair look so much smoother and softer when i use it. i love the texture, it feels really nice on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this shampoo.. I absolutely love the smell of it. And I definitely. Makes my hair soft , smooth. I was skeptic at first but I honestly love it literally.  It may become my to go to shampoo now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free, this shampoo smells amazing! It is made with olive extract, and it definitely smooths my frizziness in the hair. Made with clean ingredients which is also a plus! Will definitely buy again!
